comprehensive_overview: The Nvidia PTX (Parallel Thread Execution) backend for GCC enables the generation of PTX code, which is a low-level parallel thread execution virtual machine and instruction set architecture used by Nvidia GPUs. It allows users to compile and optimize C and C++ code for Nvidia GPUs.
core_features: Generating PTX code for Nvidia GPUs
Compiling and optimizing C and C++ code for GPU execution
